headline: Pentair Q4 Earnings & Sales Surpass Estimates, Increase Y/Y
summary: PNR tops Q4 EPS and sales estimates, lifts margins and revenues Y/Y, and raises dividends as strong Flow and Pool results offset Water Solutions.

headline: Gear Up for Xylem (XYL) Q4 Earnings: Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Beyond analysts' top-and-bottom-line estimates for Xylem (XYL), evaluate projections for some of its key metrics to gain a better insight into how the business might have performed for the quarter ended December 2025.

headline: Is Xylem (XYL) Fairly Priced After Recent Steady Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether Xylem's share price gives you fair value or not, it helps to step back and look at what the current market price might be implying about the business. The stock last closed at US$139.74, with returns of 3.1% over the past week, 0.5% over the last month, 1.9% year to date, 8.9% over the past year, 36.3% over three years and 46.4% over five years. These returns give you a sense of how the market has treated the stock recently, but they do not tell you whether the...

headline: 2 Industrials Stocks with Solid Fundamentals and 1 Facing Headwinds
summary: Whether you see them or not, industrials businesses play a crucial part in our daily activities. Their momentum is also rising as lower interest rates have incentivized higher capital spending. As a result, the industry has posted a 22% gain over the past six months, beating the S&P 500 by 12.2 percentage points.
